column1:
Professor Dino:
"Welcome! Today, we’ll dive
into how data can uncover
patterns in behavior."

Professor Dino:
"This is how we predict
probabilities using data
analysis."
Kaushik:\n(whispers) "These algorithms\ncould lead us to the suspect."
Professor Dino:\n"Here’s a 3D visualization. It helps to see\nit all laid out."

Professor Dino:
(locking up) "Don’t forget to
review everything we
covered."
Harsh:\n"Look at that graph! It points\nright to someone."
Kaushik:\n(as they leave) "I can’t wait\nto apply this to our case."
